summary.span: 擴充根設計文件之設計模式行為的基底設計工具類別，此根設計文件支援巢狀的元件。

span.span: Base designer class for extending the design mode behavior of a root design document that supports nested components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供的支援巢狀的元件的根設計文件的設計工具中的基底類別。 provides a base class for designers of root design documents that support nested components. 除了方法與功能，繼承自類別，實作介面，以提供根層級設計模式檢視相關聯的元件，和任何巢狀元件。In addition to the methods and functionality inherited from the class, implements the interface to provide a root-level design mode view for the associated component, and any nested components. > [!NOTE] > 根層級設計模式檢視或通常由內建的根目錄設計工具提供。The root-level design mode view for a or is typically provided by a built-in root designer. 自訂實作，才可提供其他類型的根元件在設計模式中的檢視。A custom implementation is required to provide a view for other types of root components in design mode. 您可以將設計工具與型別，使用。You can associate a designer with a type using a . 自訂設計階段行為的概觀，請參閱[擴充設計階段支援](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2)。For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2).

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true 時，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool GetToolSupported(class System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem tool) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function GetToolSupported (tool As ToolboxItem) As Boolean
abstract member GetToolSupported : System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem -> bool override this.GetToolSupported : System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem -> bool

span.span: The to test for toolbox support.

summary.span: 取得值，指出設計工具是否支援指定的工具。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the specified tool is supported by the designer.

returns.span: 如果應在工具箱上啟用工具，則為 ；如果文件設計工具不知道如何使用工具，則為 。

span.span: if the tool should be enabled on the toolbox; if the document designer doesn't know how to use the tool.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果支援的工具，它將會啟用工具箱 中設計工具重新取得焦點時。If a tool is supported, it will be enabled in the toolbox when the designer regains focus. 否則，它將會停用。Otherwise, it will be disabled. 一旦工具會標示為已啟用，或將它停用時，無法查詢一次。Once a tool is marked as enabled or disabled it cannot be queried again.

span.span: The to associate with the designer.

summary.span: 使用指定的元件，初始化設計工具。

span.span: Initializes the designer with the specified component.

para.span: 設計工具可以存取元件的站台，並要求來自它的服務，在此方法。

span.span: The designer can access the component's site and request services from it in this method.
